name: Colorblock Quilt Pattern
description:
The Colorblock Pattern is simple and modern baby quilt pattern designed to showcase bold fabrics.  This pattern contains directions for creating a 40" x 55" quilt top with a solid backing.  It is fat quarter friendly and perfect for beginner quilters.

This listing is for a digital copy of the directions only (PDF).

This 12 page quilt pattern features the following:
- Cutting layout diagrams 
- Block assembly diagrams 
- Final quilt assembly diagrams
- Helpful tips for making this pattern

This pattern is for one person only. Please do not sell, distribute, or copy this pattern without prior written consent.

License to sell:  You may sell items made with this pattern, on a home-based production scale.  Please give credit to Bijou Lovely for the pattern design on any labels or online listings.

name: Project Life 2013 Printable Calendar Cards
description: A month by month view of 2013.  Printable 3 x 4" cards for your Project Life album.  These coordinate well with the Seafoam edition!  You will receive a digital copy of this 3 page PDF immediately after purchase at the email address associated with your Paypal account.

name: Be Inspired Close-up 8x10 Print
description:
This is a signed 8x10 print of an original photograph of my "Be Inspired" quilt.

Professionally printed on premium quality metallic photo paper with lustre coating to protect against fingerprints and UV exposure.  The metallic paper gives the print almost a 3 dimensional effect and has a subtle sheen to it.  Watermark will not be present on printed copy.

All prints are signed on the back and are unmatted and unframed.  Prints are packaged in a protective sleeve with cardboard backing, and shipped in a stay-flat mailing envelope.

Please contact me if you'd like this print in another size.

©2012 Holly DeGroot/Bijou Lovely. All rights reserved.

Special thanks to the fabric designers whose prints are featured in this quilt:  Leah Duncan, Laurie Wisbrun, Lucie Summers, Lizzy House, Emily Taylor, Joel Dewberry, and Timeless Treasures.

name: Adventure Printable Artwork
description:
A colorful print to remind to you enjoy the every day adventures in life!  

You will receive a digital PDF file for printing at home or uploading to a professional printer.  Artwork is sized to fit an 8"x10" frame.

Please note you will NOT receive any printed artwork when purchasing this product, only the digital file is included.  Also be aware that colors may not be depicted 100% accurately on your computer monitor.

All orders will be sent immediately following payment to the email address linked to your PayPal account. Please check your spam folder if you don't see it in your inbox.

name: Destash - Joel Dewberry Raspberry Ginseng Cotton Sateen
description: 2 yards of home decor weight cotton sateen from Joel Dewberry's Ginseng collection.  Raspberry, burgundy, and gray.

name: Destash - Joel Dewberry Ginseng Cotton Sateen
description: 2 yards of home decor weight cotton sateen from Joel Dewberry's Ginseng collection.  Yellow, gray, and cream.
